metadata.description: Mapping of Indian Penal Code (IPC) 1860 sections to Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) 2023 sections
metadata.notes: Sections marked as 'Deleted' have no direct equivalent in BNS. New sections in BNS have no IPC equivalent.

new_bns_sections.title: Commencement - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Power to appoint commencement date delegated to Central Government

new_bns_sections.title: Definition of Child - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Child means any person below the age of eighteen years

new_bns_sections.title: Words and expressions used but not defined - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: References to IT Act 2000 and BNSS 2023 for undefined terms

new_bns_sections.title: Abetment outside India for offence in India - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Person who abets an offence from outside India

new_bns_sections.title: Sexual intercourse by employing deceitful means - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Includes false promise to marry

new_bns_sections.title: Hiring employing or engaging a child to commit an offence - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Includes sexual exploitation and pornography

new_bns_sections.title: Punishment for murder by mob - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Group of five or more persons committing murder on grounds of race, caste, community, sex, place of birth, language, personal belief

new_bns_sections.title: Causing death by negligence escape provision - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Not yet in force as of 1st July 2024

new_bns_sections.title: Organised crime - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Includes kidnapping, robbery, vehicle theft, extortion, land grabbing, contract killing, cyber-crimes, trafficking

new_bns_sections.title: Petty organised crime - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Theft, snatching, cheating, unauthorised selling of tickets, gambling, selling public examination question papers

new_bns_sections.title: Terrorist act - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Comprehensive definition of terrorist activities

new_bns_sections.title: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt resulting in permanent disability - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Punishment for permanent disability or persistent vegetative state

new_bns_sections.title: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt by mob - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Group of five or more persons on grounds of race, caste, community, etc.

new_bns_sections.title: Acts endangering sovereignty unity and integrity of India - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Replaces sedition; includes electronic communication and financial means

new_bns_sections.title: Publishing false or misleading information jeopardising sovereignty - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: New clause for false information affecting national security

new_bns_sections.title: Attempt to commit suicide to compel or restrain exercise of lawful power - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Attempt to commit suicide to compel public servant from discharging duty

new_bns_sections.title: Snatching - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: New specific offence for snatching

new_bns_sections.title: Mischief causing loss or damage to Government or Local Authority property - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: New provision for damage to government property

new_bns_sections.title: Mischief causing loss or damage of one lakh rupees or more - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Enhanced punishment for higher value damage

new_bns_sections.title: Possessing counterfeit seal plate or instrument - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: New sub-section for possession of counterfeit instruments

new_bns_sections.title: Fraudulently using counterfeit seal plate or instrument - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: New sub-section for fraudulent use of counterfeit instruments

new_bns_sections.title: Repeal and Savings - NEW
new_bns_sections.notes: Provisions for repeal of IPC and savings for pending cases
